content.rendered: [vc_row type=”in_container” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” scene_position=”center” text_color=”dark” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none”][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_spacing=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][image_with_animation image_url=”14377″ animation=”None” hover_animation=”none” alignment=”” border_radius=”none” box_shadow=”none” image_loading=”default” max_width=”100%” max_width_mobile=”default”][vc_column_text]IRCC assesses your eligibility for the Federal Skilled Worker Program through Six Selection factors: Age, Education, Language, Work Experience, Arranged Employment, and Adaptability. Points are awarded out of 100; one must get at least 67 points to qualify for this program. You can check your Federal Skilled Worker Program score using our FSW Points Calculator. If a candidate scores less than 67 points out of 100, they cannot apply for Canadian permanent residency under the Federal Skilled Worker Program. This FSW Calculator will help you understand the factors you need to improve to qualify for this program.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
